PH Series SFR-001 In Stock

PH Series 2-Pin Receptacle Housing

Compact 2.0mm pitch wire-to-board connector housing with friction lock mechanism. Ideal for high-density PCB applications in consumer electronics, LED lighting, and portable devices.

Quick Specifications

Part Number
SFR-001
Pitch
2.0mm
Positions
2
Voltage
100V
Current
2A

Technical Specifications

Electrical Ratings

Current Rating 2A (AWG #28)
Voltage Rating 100V AC/DC
Contact Resistance 20 mΩ max
Insulation Resistance 1000 MΩ min
Withstanding Voltage 500V AC

Mechanical Characteristics

Pitch 2.0mm
Number of Positions 2
Housing Material PA66 GF
Flame Rating UL94V-0
Operating Temperature -25°C to +85°C

Key Features

Ultra-Compact Design

2.0mm pitch for high-density PCB layouts in space-constrained devices.

Friction Lock Mechanism

Secure connection retention without additional locking mechanisms.

PA66 GF Material

Glass-filled polyamide with UL94V-0 flame rating for safety.

JST Compatible

100% compatible with JST PH series connectors and terminals.

Typical Applications

Consumer Electronics

Smartphones, tablets, wearables, portable devices.

LED Lighting

LED strips, luminaires, signage, drivers.

Computer Peripherals

Internal connections, power delivery, signals.

IoT Devices

Smart home devices, sensors, controllers.

Automotive

Dashboard modules, sensors, infotainment.

Medical Devices

Portable equipment, monitoring systems.
